abstract.t: This draft identifies criteria to be used by the LMAP WG in evaluating and selecting Control and Reporting Protocols described by [I-D.ietf-lmap-framework] and identified as WG deliverables in the LMAP charter. It is not intended for use for any other purpose or by any other party. This draft will not be maintained after LMAP completes its selection of these protocols. The authors of this draft do not intend to ask for working group adoption or formal publication by IETF.
